You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesU U] > &ubrcy;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Ubrcy;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/040e/index.htm U+0040E].
  * `&ubrcy;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/045e/index.htm U+0045E].
